Smart Coat Rack: A coat rack that can recognize and sort your belongings using AI technology. It can categorize your coats, jackets, and bags based on their type, material, and owner. This smart coat rack can also provide suggestions for matching accessories and outfits based on your wardrobe. Confidence score: 0.8

Interactive Coat Rack: A coat rack that comes to life when you approach it. It can play music, display weather forecasts, or even offer you a warm hug when you're feeling chilly. The coat rack can be controlled using voice commands or gesture recognition. Confidence score: 0.9

Modular Coat Rack: A coat rack that can be easily customized and expanded as your needs change. It can be made up of interlocking modules that can be added or removed as needed, allowing you to create a coat rack that fits your space perfectly. Confidence score: 0.8

Vertical Garden Coat Rack: A coat rack that doubles as a living wall. It can be designed with built-in planters that allow you to grow herbs, succulents, or other plants. The coat rack can also be equipped with sensors that monitor the humidity and temperature levels, ensuring that your plants are always happy and healthy. Confidence score: 0.9

Glow-in-the-Dark Coat Rack: A coat rack that lights up in the dark, providing a unique and stylish addition to any room. The coat rack can be made using glow-in-the-dark materials, such as LED lights or phosphorescent paint, creating a coat rack that stands out from the rest. Confidence score: 0.8
